entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023
